title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 4227 - Rules Of The Race
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 4227 - Rules Of The Race

State Regulations
§ 4227.1 - Repealed
§ 4227.2 - Foul riding penalized
§ 4227.3 - Results of intentional foul
§ 4227.4 - Instructions to jockeys
§ 4227.5 - Judges may declare race void, order refund
§ 4227.6 - Horse must return to course
§ 4227.7 - Judge may dispense with walkover

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 4227

Statutory authority: L. 1970, ch. 1023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
